snippet.title: Sport Report - Super Bowl Edition
snippet.description: Stephen will not be satisfied unless the Reagan tribute at the Super Bowl takes up the full halftime show and the third quarter.

snippet.title: Superb Owl XLVIII - Football Health Concerns - Steve Fainaru & Mark Fainaru-Wada
snippet.description: "League of Denial" authors Steve Fainaru and Mark Fainaru-Wada argue that the NFL is ignoring the connection between football and brain damage.

snippet.title: February 3, 2011 - Jane McGonigal
snippet.description: In this episode, February is Black History Month, and that is pretty much all the black history I know. Then, my Super Bowl preview: I've got a very strong feeling about which two teams are going to play. And my guest, Jane McGonigal, says playing video...

snippet.title: Mercury Poisoning
snippet.description: George and Gil's excessive tuna eating comes back to haunt them, two Pennsylvanian pawn shop owners switch places, and Dr. Armond consults with public defender Ron Funches.

snippet.title: January 30, 2014 - Drew Brees
snippet.description: Superb Owl XLVIII & Football Health Concerns, NFL & Medical Marijuana, Steve Fainaru & Mark Fainaru-Wada on Football Brain Damage, "State of Denial," Ed Murray & Michael Hancock Friendly Bet, Drew Brees, "Playoff Face Off"
